long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How it Works:
Freespoke shows you all sides, with privacy. Add our extension to use Freespoke as your default search engine. After adding our extension your browser will use Freespoke for all of your searches. 

--------
About Us:

Welcome to Freespoke — where information meets empowerment.

Why choose Freespoke?

PRIVACY AS A RIGHT
We believe privacy is not just a feature but a fundamental right for every user.

UNCOVER HIDDEN STORIES
Break free from Big Tech and media censorship. Explore stories that foster open debate and awareness.

KID SAFE
Provide a secure online environment for kids, free from Big Tech trackers and adult content.

END HUMANTRAFFICKING
Freespoke is free from porn and donates 30% of proceeds from premium subscriptions to fight humantrafficking.

SUPPORT AMERICAN SMALL BUSINESSES
Discover 100% American-made brands and products, supporting local businesses and ensuring quality.

CHAMPION FREE SPEECH
Enjoy complete access to information, as we safeguard your right to express yourself freely.

360° NEWS COVERAGE
Stay informed with diverse news perspectives, side-by-side viewpoints, and clearly labeled biases (left/middle/right).

Join the Freespoke movement.

Learn more about our mission at freespoke.com/about.
